oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Easter egg hunt at West Park, Nashville, Tennessee, 1962 April 18
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A scene from the April 18th, 1962 Easter Egg Hunt at West Park in Nashville, Tennessee. Many youngsters participated in this event and there were many eggs hidden for the children to eagerly find, along with refreshments and Easter baskets at the recreation building. The Mayor of the City of Nashville, Mayor Ben West, is pictured at the event, along with several parents, teachers, and City of Nashville Police Officers on hand for the event. The 1963 City Directory cites the address of West Park at 6001 Morrow Road, with a nearby Recreation Building. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
